abstract: The country has strict privacy laws, but consumers are still flocking to social networking and downloading the latest smartphone apps.
snippet: The country has strict privacy laws, but consumers are still flocking to social networking and downloading the latest smartphone apps.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — Chenchao Liu has 446 friends on Facebook, loves his iPhone 3GS and is obsessed with Google searches and maps.

headline.main: Despite Privacy Inquiries, Germans Flock to Google, Facebook and Apple
headline.print_headline: Despite Privacy Inquiries, Germans Flock to Google, Facebook and Apple
